title: can someone tell me some of the artists that have worked for riot?
body: i know some artists that have worked for and still work for riot like zeronis, shillin, etc but im just wondering what artists do the login screen and stuff like that one of vi fighting blue buff.... any help would be appreciated! thanks :)

replies.body:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/JivWAhFX-splash-art-artists?comment=0000

> Here are the personal sites of some of our concept artists.
> 
> https://christianfell.carbonmade.com/ 
> http://www.jasonchanart.com/ 
> http://alexflores.deviantart.com/gallery/
